bug.description:
Tests in version 3.4.2 fail on FreeBSD 12.2: <denchmark-code>The following tests FAILED: 1 - CallbackTest (Failed) 2 - DrusillaSelectTest (Failed) 4 - FastMKSTest (Failed) 6 - HPTTest (Failed) 7 - HyperplaneTest (Failed) 8 - InitRulesTest (Failed) 9 - LinearSVMTest (Failed) 10 - LocalCoordinateCodingTest (Failed) 12 - LogisticRegressionTest (Failed) 13 - LSHTest (Failed) 14 - MatrixCompletionTest (Failed) 16 - QLearningTest (Failed) 17 - QDAFNTest (Failed) 19 - SerializationTest (Failed) 20 - TerminationPolicyTest (Failed) 25 - FastMKSMainTest (Failed) 26 - LinearSVMMainTest (Failed) 27 - LCCMainTest (Failed) 28 - LogisticRegressionMainTest (Failed) 29 - LSHMainTest (Failed) 30 - PerceptronMainTest (Failed) 31 - catch_test (Bus error) </denchmark-code>
For example: <denchmark-code>$ /usr/ports/math/mlpack/work/.build/bin/mlpack_test -t CallbackTest Running 10 test cases... unknown location(0): fatal error: in "CallbackTest/FFNCallbackTest": memory access violation at address: 0x800d0d2de: object specific hardware error /usr/ports/math/mlpack/work/mlpack-3.4.2/src/mlpack/tests/callback_test.cpp(42): last checkpoint: "FFNCallbackTest" test entry
*** 1 failure is detected in the test module "mlpackTest"
$ "/usr/ports/math/mlpack/work/.build/bin/mlpack_test" "-t" "LogisticRegressionTest" Running 26 test cases... unknown location(0): fatal error: in "LogisticRegressionTest/LogisticRegressionFunctionRandomEvaluate": memory access violation at address: 0x800d0d2de: object specific hardware error /usr/ports/math/mlpack/work/mlpack-3.4.2/src/mlpack/tests/logistic_regression_test.cpp(53): last checkpoint: "LogisticRegressionFunctionRandomEvaluate" test entry
*** 1 failure is detected in the test module "mlpackTest" </denchmark-code>
